channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Judy finds her inner hero on a camping trip in 'Paddington's Race Against the Storm', then in 'Paddington's Super Snail', Paddington befriends a speedy snail with a heroic future ahead. (S3, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston's Visit: Gaston catches a cold when his cave has a leaky roof, so Holly invites him to stay at the Little Castle until it is fixed. But soon Gaston is taking over.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Trip To The Seaside: Holly joins Ben and his family on a trip to the seaside, and Mr Elf tells her that no magic is to be used. But when no one has remembered to pack lunch, they ask Holly to help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben's Birthday Card: Holly forgets Ben's birthday, and rushes home to make him a birthday card. But Nanny has stopped all magic, so Holly has to make the card herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Books: Queen Thistle reads the children a story, which inspires a question. They can't find the answer in the magic books in the castle, so go instead to the Wise Old Elf in the Great Elf Library.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Surfing: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Great Barrier Reef: Today the family go to work with Mrs Kangaroo on the Great Barrier Reef. While taking in the beautiful views in Mrs Kangaroo's submarine, they find some special treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Boomerang: The holiday is coming to an end but there's still time to play with a Boomerang and make friends with Mr Wallaby. They all have trouble keeping the boomerang under control, though.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Nursery Rhymes: Madame Gazelle and the playgroup are sharing their best nursery rhymes with each other.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hollywood; School Bus Trip; Rebecca Rabbit; Nature Trail; Pen Pal; Granny and Grandpa's Attic; The Quarrel; The Toy Cupboard: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Rebecca Rabbit; Nature Trail; Pen Pal; Granny and Grandpa's Attic; The Quarrel; The Toy Cupboard: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save Heady Humdinger: Mayor Humdinger has been carving his face into the cliffs of Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines
channel.desc: Ice Cream Monster Machine: Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach home in time! (S5, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Pandy's Birthday: It's Pandy's birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! (S1, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus; Happily Ever After: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: We see a strange land where Chickaletta is royalty in 'Pups Save Queen Cluck-Cluck', then in 'Pups Save a Desert Flounder', Travelling Travis's balloon gets caught on the Flounder. (S7, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: A storm drops hailstones that hatch into baby space rocks in 'Pups Save the Baby Space Rocks', and in 'Pups Save the Eddies and Emmys', a 3D printer leads to pranks all over Adventure Bay. (S9, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Meteor Madness: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower from the mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too. (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Pest Friends Forever: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still! (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help Grandpa bowl a strike in 'The Crew Builds A Bowling Alley', then in 'The Crew Builds A Superbloom Path', a flower-friendly footpath saves the day. (S2, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam tries to blend in with a tough clan of hyenas in 'The Undercover Hyena', and in 'The Stranger in the Burrow', underground creatures start getting spooked by the burrow's new addition. (S1, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Clumsy decides that the sky is the place to be in 'Flying Ace', then in 'Lab Assistant', when Brainy gets hurt, Papa Smurf asks Monkey to take Brainy's place as his assistant. (S1, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora finds a new shell for a hermit crab in 'Crabby Boots', then in 'Papi's Picnic Party', Dora delivers the ingredients for Papi's quesadillas. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington hurts his knee in 'Paddington Visits the Doctor', then in 'Paddington and the Sleep Over', Mr. Brown's sleepover needs to be great when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night! (S2, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Holiday; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Panda Twins; Lots of Muddy Puddles: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mandy Mouse; Recorders: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Miss Rabbit's Relaxation Class; Parking Ticket: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's School: Holly and Ben spend a day at Lucy's school, whilst trying not to be spotted by Lucy's teacher, Miss Cookie.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Baby Dragon: The children have adopted a new pet - a dragon named Dave.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dolly Plum: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps with an egg in 'Paddington's Hatching Surprise', then in 'Paddington the Best Bear', Paddington wishes that he could have been at Mr. & Mrs. Brown's wedding. (S2, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Sam and Kit look for a mysterious bird in 'The Puzzle of the Plummeting Eggs', then 'The Missing Mole Rat Princess', the duo tracks down a royal mole rat who left her underground palace. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Meteor Madness: The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower from the mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too. (S2, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Sharkdog
channel.desc: Pest Friends Forever: Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still! (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Gabby Gets the Hiccups: The dollhouse delivery is a cat-in-the-box that startles Gabby, giving her the hiccups. Dr. Pandy and the Gabby Cats try several cures to make them go away. (S1, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel convinces Dimwitty and Begonia that he is nice in 'Crashing Gargamel's Party', then in 'The Curse of the Smurfs' Treasure', Farmer and Vanity unearth an unlucky magical chest! (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Farmer's snails go on strike in 'The Snail Whisperer', and then in 'Smurfs Might Fly', The Smurfs prepare for their sarsaparilla banquet, unaware that Gargamel has enchanted the thicket. (S2, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Ruff-Ruff Pack take a bus on a wild jump in 'Rescue at Twisty Top Mesa', and in 'Pups Save A Sneezy Chase', Chase's cat allergies lead him to the desert and he's trapped with the pack. (S7, ep 24).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Humdinger builds a mechanical rain cloud in 'Pups vs the Hum-Cloud', then in 'Pups Stop the Mid-Air Magnet', Otis gets a powerful magnetic drone. (S11, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse: When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all in the wrong place, and a series of wacky misadventures ensues. (S1, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Funny Music; Buttercups, Daisies and Dandelions: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Marble Run; Grandpa Pig's Metal Detector: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Shooting Star: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after a presumed shooting star lands in the Little Kingdom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nanny's Magic Test: Nanny's magic licence is out of date and in order to get a new one she must pass a test, set by the Wise Old Elf.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Olly is entrusted with Chef's special cornbread pan in 'Chili & Cornbread', and then in 'Layer Cake', Chef tries to make a record breaking cake. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Danny X straps on a rocket booster in 'Pups Stop A Rocket-Powered Pogo Stick', then in 'Pups Save the Sky-High Stunt Show', Francois' stunt goes horribly awry. (S11, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: World Book Day: For World Book Day, the playgroup must dress up as a character from their favourite book. But Peppa can't decide which as she has so many favourites.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Children's Festival: Peppa and her family attend the children's festival and enjoy lots of singing, dancing, crafts and listening to stories.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Muddy Festival; Strawberries: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington and Robot Paddingtron enjoy being heroes in 'Paddington and Paddingtron's Heroic Day', then in 'Paddington's Heroic Non-Stop Adventure', Paddington discovers how to be calm. (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington and the Unlikely Hero', then in 'Paddington Needs a Hero', Paddington gets stuck in an igloo! (S3, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Betty Caterpillar: Ben and Holly meet a new friend, Betty Caterpillar, but she is sad that she can't join in their games because she can't fly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Holly: Holly is left in charge when King and Queen Thistle go away on important business, but ruling the Little Kingdom isn't as easy as it looks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Tooth Fairy: Ben and Holly are excited when they learn that Nanny Plum is a Tooth Fairy at night, and go along with her to pick up a little girl's tooth. But the little girl is not so little.
